forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: interactions with touchpad/stick

comments.text: i would really like to make a single action revolver that allows you to pull back the hammer using the downward direction on the thumbstick/touchpad because this binding is not-
used for anything else. this could also allow you to implement gestures into your avatar easier if it is a body tell. said gestures could be a thumbs up or a pointing finger
i suggested it multiple times, philip is holding this keybind to future devices...
seconded, the touchpad/thumbstick center click and l r u d directions could send body tells that, if intercepted, could activate another action than the defaults.
i almost exclusively turn and mostly teleport using my right hand, i would leave the left c and right l/r/c unbound for movement, that would leave left u/d/l/r and right u/d for
tells that could allow for a lot of interactivity. those combined with trigger pulls and a tell from the grip/delete buttom would allow for so many combinations for actions.

thread.latestCommentText: tells that could allow for a lot of interactivity. those combined with trigger pulls and a tell from the grip/delete buttom would allow for so many combinations for actions.
